name: Toyota
description: Toyota is known for its reliability, offering a wide range of vehicles from fuel-efficient compact cars to rugged off-road SUVs.

name: Ford
description: Ford is an American automotive legend, producing trucks, cars, and SUVs with a reputation for toughness and innovation.

name: BMW
description: BMW, a German luxury car manufacturer, is synonymous with performance, precision engineering, and elegance.

name: Mercedes
description: Mercedes-Benz represents sophistication and cutting-edge technology in the world of luxury automobiles.

name: Tesla
description: Tesla is at the forefront of electric vehicle innovation, offering sustainable and high-performance cars.

name: Honda
description: Honda is known for its reliable and efficient vehicles, from compact cars to family-friendly SUVs.
